content: Stocks Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 30 Jun 2019Are we allowed to bid stock price after trading hours/office hours for the day? E.g. Sat/Sun. Will the price we bidded be in the queue for the next trading day?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Darren ChewLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 30 Jun 2019Yes, you can and if the trade is not executed, it will be purge off after the market is closed in the next trading day.You can also place a GTD (good to date) order and queue for 1 month. The order will be removed after the expiry date.0 comments3
